titles: By the King. To our trusty and welbeloved high shieriffe [sic] of our county of York.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
publisher: Imprinted at Yorke by Robert Barker, and now reprinted at London and are to be sold by G.B. at his shop neere Cliffords Inne.,
notes: Royal arms, with init. "C R" at head of title; initial.
"Given at Our Court at Yorke the fifth day of May, in the eightenth [sic] yeare of Our Reigne, &c."
Reproduction of original in: Eton College. Library.
